mapper.select: select p.project_code as code from w_project p where p.project_code like CONCAT(#{preCode},'%') order by p.create_time desc limit 0,1

select pa.project_area_id as id, pa.area_name as name from w_project_area pa where pa.project_area_id in ( select ua.project_area_id from w_user_auth ua where ua.user_id = ${userId} and ua.project_area_id is not null) order by pa.area_code asc

select pa.project_area_id as id, pa.area_name as name from w_project_area pa where pa.project_area_id in
${id}
